reviewText: I cannot think of anything bad to say about this.  The subtitles are a little different from what I have seen for this show, but overall it is no problem.  The acting is superb and we have never laughed so hard.  So glad you had this and would love to see more Japanese Dramas on Amazon.  I highly reccomend this and all the Gokusen DVDs to everyone.  This just happens to be my favorite season of Gokusen.
